runs.comm: pitched on off stump, no room to cut, Watson chops it down off the inner edge of the bat
close! inside edge onto his pads, just misses the off stump, Watson hesitates and sets off, reaches his crease after the throw hits the stumps at the non-strikers end
fullish outside off, driven confidently towards extra cover, a good sliding stop cuts off a couple of runs
outside off and glided past gully with an open face
oustide off and a thickish outside edge beats first slip who dives in vain to his right, the ball races away to third man, Scotland are underway, that should ease the nerves
short of a length, Watson picks the length and pulls, doesnt quite time it as well, mid-on runs across and cuts it off
fuller in length and on off stump, no room to cut as Watts dabs it back to Gul
watts backs away, has a wild swish at it, misses it completely
Gul thuds this in short and at a lively pace, Watts ducks and the ball rose too high, high enough for the umpire to signal a wide
fullish outside off, neat square drive off the front foot finds the fielder at point
good length on middle, fended to the on side
and Gul strikes early! outside off, Watson backs away trying to cut over point, doesnt get the elevation and Hafeez at point gets forward and pulls off a neat catch
good length on off, no swing, driven to short cover
misfield: flicked down the leg side, Gul at short fine leg was really lazy in getting to it as the ball beats him to his left, sloppy stuff
good length on off stump, driven to mid-on
short of a length, Watts picks the line and length early and pulls, beats the fielder at deep square leg who dives in despair
outside off, no swing yet for Asif, punched to point
fuller in length and around off stump, pushed hard off the frontfoot to short cover
good teasing line outside off, pitched up and Poonia nearly gets the edge on the frontfoot drive, beats him
dug in a little short outside off, Poonia fends it off the backfoot to third man rather uncomfortably
Watts steps down and gets an under edge past short fine leg, free hit for Scotland
Free Hit and Watts makes the most of it! full and in the slot to be hit down the ground, Watts steps forward and spanks it past mod-on
outside off and glanced with an open face to the deep on the off side
outside off, Poonia opens the face and sort of scoops it to third man, premeditated stroke
beaten, outside off and Watts tries to dab it down to third man, misses
played down with soft hands, the ball nearly rolls to the stumps, cheeky single taken, Asif charges down but the batsman beats him to the crease
short, attempted pull, mistimed as the ball gets the under half of the bat and rolls to short fine leg
outside off, backed away to the leg stump, the ball flies off the top edge and goes one bounce to third man
short and pulled! Watts reads Asif's mind almost, swivels and finds the gap at square leg perfectly
lapse in concentration as Watts goes for a wild slog, misses it completely
slower ball and short of a length, allows Watts to scoop it comfortably to third man
outside off and nudged away with ease to third man, Watts doing this easily
Poonia loses patience and gets trapped with a yorker, Gul lands it on the base of middle and leg, Poonia backs away and exposes all his stumps, the bails come off
beaten outside off
over the wicket to the left hander, Hamilton nudges it to the on side, sets off quickly, just about scampers to the other end, the throw is wide
Watts loses patience, backs away to the leg side, Gul follows him and lands it wide outside off
backs away and this time he pushes it to the on side
pushed to mid-on
round the wicket, stops at his delivery stride, slips it wide outside off, Hamilton attempts a sweep but changes his mind
reverse sweep,. didnt quite execute it well enough, plays it softly to short third man
tossed on leg, swung across the line to deep midwicket, the ball was in the air for a while and that got everyone excited
full toss, Watts gets down on his knees and scoops it on the full over short fine-leg
nudged away to the on side
pushed it flat on leg stump, Hamilton goes for the slog over midwicket, doesn't get the timing or elevation as the ball goers down the throat of Gul
dabbed to gully with an open face
that's two for the over! McCallum goes for an ugly hoick, doesnt meet the pitch of the ball as the ball gets the top edge, Asif at long leg takes it comfortably
outside edge to short third man, they set off for a run, sent back
steps down the ground and just beats long-on
Watts steps down and tries another big hit, the ball gets the top edge and Nazir takes it comfortably at short third-man
steps down and doesnt get the elevation, rush of blood for Brown, long-on takes the catch
fended to the on side
sliding down leg, flicked off the pads to fine leg boundary
bowled full and quick, angling into the left-hander's pads, Haq tries to drive but doesn't make contact
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
played through cover point for a single
Smith gets down on one knee and pulls Hafeez behind square
bowled full and quick on off stump, defended back to the bowler
beaten outside the off stump, that one nearly bowled him
Smith moves towards the off side and sweeps past the wicketkeeper to the fine leg boundary
cut towards backward point where an athletic effort saves runs
drifts down leg side, wide called
played off the pads towards midwicket

Afridi gets his fourth! That was bowled quick on middle stump, Smith moved back and tried to play a reverse sweep, the ball hurried on to him and he scooped a comfortable catch to short fine third man
defended towards mid-on off the front foot
pushed down the ground for another single
pulled through square leg for one more, Scotland need more than this
driven off the front foot through midwicket for a single
bowled flat and straight, angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Haq defends back to the bowler
cut off the back foot to Umar Gul in the deep
hit uppishly towards midwicket for another single
bowled full on off and middle stump, Wright backs away and drives to mid-off for a single
cut through point off the back foot  for one more
bowled short on middle stump, that one skidded through on Wright who was beaten on the pull
this time he connects with the pull and gets two more to deep midwicket
Wright backs away and drives a full ball towards mid-off where Afridi runs across and dives to make an excellent save
flicked off the pads towards midwicket
Afridi strays down leg side, wide called by umpire Taufel
swept towards deep backward square leg for a single
driven uppishly towards Shoaib Malik who is standing right back on the circle at cover, the batsmen steal the single
played through point for  a single
bowled quick and flat outside off stump, Wright tries to cut but gets beaten
driven through midwicket for a single
Haq tries to cut through point but Afridi is too quick for him, the ball skids and speeds past the bat
Arafat bowls a slower one outside off stump, Wright backs away and tries to hit through the off side but gets beaten by the change in pace
Wright backs away once again and gets beaten as he tries to hammer it through the off side
driven on the front foot through cover for a single
cut hard into the ground towards Malik at point
slower ball on leg stump, flicked off the pads behind square leg for a single
too wide outside the off stump, driven off the back foot through cover
Gul returns and begins with a wide outside the off stump
Wright backs away to make room and lofts Gul with a flat bat over cover
full and straight on middle stump, Wright backs away once again and tries to slog it through the off side, the length is much too full for that shot and the ball crashes into middle stump
outstanding yorker, it's too full and fast for the No 10 and Blain was several moments too late with his defense and Gul hits his middle stump
Gul's hat-trick ball it too wide outside off stump, Nel scoops it in the air behind point for a single
another yorker sears into the block hole, Haq manages to dig it out to fine leg
Gul was searching for the yorker once more, he over-pitches on leg stump and Nel drives the ball between mid-on and midwicket
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
the slower ball outside off stump, Haq was too early on the cut and got beaten
Haq tries to cut but gets beaten once again because of the lack of footwork
a slow full toss outside off stump has Haq completely foxed
cut in the air down to third man for a single, Asif runs around from third man and does the fielding
Nel makes room and lofts down to long-on where Nazir mis-fields to allow the boundary
tossed up on off stump, driven on the front foot towards point
Haq tries to cut but gets beaten by the turn
swept towards deep square leg for a single
pushed off the pads through square leg for one more
Malik tosses it up outside leg stump, Haq backs away and cuts through covers for a single
Nel tries to flick through midwicket but gets hit on the pad
bowled short on middle and leg stump, Haq pulls to deep midwicket
full toss outside the off stump, Nel backs away and hits the ball through cover, Gul lets the ball go through his legs for four
Nel backs away and plays the ball towards cover point
Asif bowls a slower ball in the blockhole outside off stump, Haq tries to run it down to third man but is beaten by the change in pace
Asif ends the match with a fast yorker on leg stump, Haq tries to swing it through the leg side, he misses and hears his stumps get rattled
